page.title: 15A day in the life of.
page.content: Some of us go home for our dinner but others stay at school for their dinners.We line up out side and get counted. After a minute we set off for the village hall to have our dinner.After dinner we walked back to school.At half past twelve we got back to school and played rugby we won 10_5.Then we went in to work. The work we were doing about was the Domesday Project .Slowly the minutes ticked by and it became 2 o'clock play time. We went out to play rugby it was a tiring game but we lost so we went in to some more work .At 3 o'clock we had a story until half past 3.We got told that if we were wearing indoor shoes we could go home.A few of us went home then the rest went home.After going home I called for my friends Anthony and Stephen.Then we went to our secret den.
